subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Ponzi and Pyramid Schemes
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A ruling by a federal judge against the Madoff trustee makes it appear likely that a lawsuit seeking money from the owners of the Mets will move to a jury trial.
snippet: A ruling by a federal judge against the Madoff trustee makes it appear likely that a lawsuit seeking money from the owners of the Mets will move to a jury trial.
